channel.title: I need help with specials
channel.description:
how do i add specials and also how do i add it so when i use a certain weapon it has a really cool animation that comes from it. like for example im using a rune scimmy and when i hit the person it makes a cool explosion or something like that.
thx for the help guys ;D
